thread.title: Leftists Flick Off Memorial Dedicated To Victims Of Communism
thread.title_full: Leftists Flick Off Memorial Dedicated To Victims Of Communism

author: Scott Greer
title: Leftists Flick Off Memorial Dedicated To Victims Of Communism
text:
— YHWH (@TankMaster5000) March 26, 2017 
Most of the responses on Twitter to these pictures mocked the idea that there should be a memorial for the many innocent people who died as a result of communist policies and repression. Ah the USA. Where you have a memorial for Victims of Communism when you should have one for Native American Genocide. 
— Javier
